reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Night sea fishing is buggy . There are no clue to fish a new type of fish. I am not able to find my friend too.

reviews.title: Funny game
reviews.comment: Please add more fish type and treasure
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty decent game
reviews.comment: I bought this game because I really liked the artwork..  And I have to say the game play is pretty decent even if it\'s more or less like a slot machine, or any kind of random based gambling device.     What ruins the experience for me is some of the horrid GUI elements, like the animated rotating cell phone, a simple animated red arrow would suffice and look much less out of place.    The game also tries to get you to install some kind of gaming-network app which you can thankfully decline.   And there are buttons for posting your fishes on facebook and adding friends from facebook, which makes the game feel a lot cheaper than it is.
reviews.author: A Google User
